attributes.action: stop the UK contributing to the funding of the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is one of four countries that contribute money towards the funding of the Eurovision song contest.  When you consider that the contest has become a national joke, and how political the voting has become, it can't be said that the contest is helping international relations for the UK.  Surely this money should be put to better use, something of actual benefit to the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
